name: Heirloom Tomato Mojitonico
description: Muddled tomatoes and herbs are mixed with gin then topped with a bracing fizz of tonic water. It's the cocktail as salad, or vice versa.
recipeIngredient: freshly ground black pepper, for rim 1/2 lime, cut into sections
1/4 cup fresh herbs (like basil, tarragon, thyme, chives or mint) loosely packed and not chopped
2 ounces tonic water, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Rim a 16-ounce glass by moistening the edge with a lime wedge, then dipping the glass into a small plate filled with equal parts salt and pepper. Into the same glass add the tomatoes, herbs and lime sections, then muddle, gently, until the mixture is equal parts juice and solids. Add ice, stir, then add the gin, and stir again. Top with the tonic water.
